Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, validating the integrity of the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates

Description: Checks for NULL values in the customer_id column, ensuring all records have a primary key as required by the constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where full_name is missing (NULL), which may impact customer identification and communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing (NULL), which may impact age calculations and regulatory compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where age is missing (NULL), which may affect demographic analysis and eligibility checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_by is missing (NULL), which may hinder audit trail and accountability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_on is missing (NULL), which may impact auditability and record tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_by is missing (NULL), which may hinder tracking of record changes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_on is missing (NULL), which may hinder tracking of record updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where status is missing (NULL), which may impact workflow and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks for email_address values that do not match a standard email pattern, ensuring valid contact information.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks for phone_number values that do not match a typical phone number pattern (digits, optional +, spaces, dashes).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^\\+?[0-9\\-\\s]{7,20}$'

Description: Ensures that date_of_birth values are not in the future, which would be invalid.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Checks for negative values in the age column, which are logically invalid.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND age < 0

Description: Identifies records where the age does not match the calculated age from date_of_birth, ensuring consistency between fields.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, date_of_birth))::int

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer contact.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which may indicate multiple records for the same identity.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates

Description: Checks for duplicate phone_number values, which may indicate multiple records for the same contact number.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT phone_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY phone_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates

Description: Checks for status values that are not within the expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks for gender values that are not within the expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks for customer_type values that are not within the expected domain (e.g., Individual, Corporate, SME, etc.).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NOT NULL AND customer_type NOT IN ('Individual','Corporate','SME')

Description: Checks for created_on values that are in the future, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > NOW()

Description: Checks for modified_on values that are in the future, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on > NOW()

Description: Checks that modified_on is not earlier than created_on, ensuring logical update sequence.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on < created_on

Description: Identifies records where account_numbers is an empty string, which may indicate missing account linkage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers = ''
